Emergency Management offers severe weather class May 1

April 11, 2019

To help residents better identify dangerous weather, Gwinnett's Office of Emergency Management is offering a free class on May 1.

Read More

Gwinnett Community Development Program: Proposed change in use of CDBG assisted property

April 1, 2019

The Gwinnett Community Development Program announces its intent to change the use of a building located at 405 N Perry St, Lawrenceville, GA 30046.

Read More

Special Election results: March 19 transit contract referendum

March 19, 2019

To view the results of the March 19 transit contract referendum click here.

Read More

Service day changes for Waste Pro customers

March 8, 2019

Waste Pro, a hauler that serves residents in unincorporated southwest Gwinnett, is making changes to service days going forward for Gwinnett County customers that will take effect the week of March 25, 2019. Affected customers will receive a notice from Waste Pro by mail regarding the changes.

Read More

Gwinnett Board of Commissioners approves final 2040 Unified Plan

February 8, 2019

The Gwinnett County Board of Commissioners on February 5 approved the final draft of the 2040 Unified Plan following a favorable review by the state Department of Community Affairs and the Atlanta Regional Commission.

Read More
